/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars and buses, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The buildings that flank the street are predominantly white and gray, their neutral tones contrasting with the vibrant blue sky above. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
